page.title: 18A GAME PADSTOW CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: {1 2 3 IN}is a game for 4 or more to play.1 person is{IT}and chooses a base e.g.a drainpipe or door and the rest go off and hide whilst he counts to 50 and then starts searching for them.The object is to touch the base shouting{ {"1 2 3 IN"}before the catcher beats you to the base and shouts{"1 2 3 see {you running towards the base"}or before the catcher finds you and rushes back to base shouting{"1 2 3 {see you hiding behind the wall etc."} If a person is caught they can be rescued by a person safely reaching base and shouting{"1 2 3 IN, Save All" If everyone is saved the chaser is{IT} again.However,if everyone is caught the first person caught that time is {IT}next time or the first one caught after a{"Save All"}is{IT.}To stop a chaser staying around the base they are said to be{egg laying}and stay{IT.
